properties.name: Feshark skarn, Feshark village, Isfahan County, Isfahan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Feshark skarn, Feshark village, Isfahan County, Isfahan Province, Iran

Type: 351

Location: Iran

There is a garnet-bearing skarn, located at 5 km north of Feshark village (close to Hana farm) about 30 km northeast of Isfahan, Central Iran. An intrusive granodiorite of the Oligocene-Miocene age intruded Cretaceous carbonate rocks which ultimately p...
